name: Lani G. HARKNESS v. UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW, Macy's East, Inc., Intervenor. Petition of Macy's East, Inc., Intervenor
name_abbreviation: Harkness v. Unemployment Compensation Board of Review

parties: Lani G. HARKNESS v. UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW, Macy’s East, Inc., Intervenor. Petition of Macy’s East, Inc., Intervenor.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of September, 2005, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED and CONSOLIDATED with the Petition for Allowance of Appeal filed at 205 MAL 2005. The Unemployment Compensation Board of Review’s Application for Relief in the Nature of a Motion to Dismiss Petitions for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
885 A.2d 980
Lani G. HARKNESS v. UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW, Macy’s East, Inc., Intervenor. Petition of Macy’s East, Inc., Intervenor.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 28, 2005.
